ref.title: Effect of alkyl chain length and temperature on the thermodynamic properties of ionic liquids 1-alkyl-3-methylimidazolium bromide in aqueous and non-aqueous solutions at different temperatures
ref.full: Sadeghi, R.; Shekaari, H.; Hosseini, R. (2009) J. Chem. Thermodyn. 41, 273-289.
